commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey, where are you going? Didn't you say we were going to persuade the members that used to be in the club?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, but I figured we should get some results first.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Results?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, even if we really want the people who left to come back, we can't just try to persuade with passion alone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If the club's just the way they left it, wouldn't they think that the same thing'll just happen again?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So we need to show them that they're not going to just have a repeat of last time. That this is a place their hard work will pay off in.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: ...That's a good point, but what should we actually do?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Get a member who's a really hard worker.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: A really hard worker? Anyone...in mind?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh?! M-Me, join the school idol club?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Please, Ayumu, you're the only one I can turn to!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: B-But I couldn't sing and dance like that! That just isn't me...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: H-Hey...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hm? What's up, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Is this the really hard worker you were talking about?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, her name's Ayumu Uehara, and we've been friends since way back in kindergarten.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You're childhood friends?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I-Is that really that shocking?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: W-Well, yeah, you've known each other for so long!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. And Ayumu's been the type to give things her best, no matter how tough it gets. I've always thought that's really awesome.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So if she's with us, I figure that she'd inspire the others, and we could all really work hard in the club.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-I'm a pretty hard worker, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, of course! I know you're a super hard worker, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But I figure you're going to need a lot more than just me to help you.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, if you say so.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, how about it, Ayumu? Let's be school idols together!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ahaha, you really are something, you know that? You've got some crazy initiative.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh, really?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I mean, you went looking for the school idol club, and immediately started recruiting when you heard it was getting disbanded.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: And... And on top of that, look at how much this underclassman trusts you. And you only met her yesterday!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You're talking about me, right? Because you're totally right! We're super tight friends already!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Haha, I see, I see.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: ...Hey, you remember what happened back in kindergarten?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: In kindergarten?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: All right, that look tells me you don't. And it was such a big deal to me, too!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You told me something, back when I was really embarrassed about the dance performance and didn't want to do it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You said that if I did my best on stage, then the whole audience would smile right back at me.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You squeezed both of my hands, saying you'd cheer me on as I did my best...and you had on the biggest smile, too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: ...I've been able to come so far in so much because of you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So I want us both to do our best with this school idol thing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait, seriously?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks so much, Ayumu! Let's do our best and make so many people smile!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, we've got good times ahead! And, um... What was your name, again?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well, you're my senior, so just call me Kasumin!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Senior? But technically, you've been in the club longer than I have, so...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey, don't worry about it! Let's just be friendly - we're all going to be club pals from now on, you know?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Friendly...like with nicknames? Hmm. If your name's Kasumi Nakasu, then... Kasukasu?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nooo! How did you know my old nickname?! All right, I'm banning that name! No Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: L-Let's just settle on Kasumi, all right?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah, let's go with that!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: S-Sorry, and glad to meet you, Kasumi. I don't know the first thing about being a school idol, so I'm going to be pretty lost, but...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: ...I'll do my best, so teach me what I need to know, all right?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Of course! I am the senior school idol here, after all!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right, let's work really hard so the other members come back!
